verses.verse: Stand <S%G4739>fast<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G3739>wherewith<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> hath made us <S%G1659>free,<s%> <S%G2248><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G3361>not<s%> entangled again <S%G1758>with<s%> <S%G3825><s%> the <S%G2218>yoke<s%> of <S%G1397>bondage.<s%>

Behold, <S%G2396><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> ye be <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G5623>profit<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

For <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that is <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3781>debtor<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>

Christ <S%G5547><s%> is become of no <S%G2673>effect<s%> unto you, <S%G3748>whosoever<s%> of you are <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law;<s%> ye are <S%G1601>fallen<s%> from <S%G5485>grace.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> through the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> wait <S%G553>for<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G2480>availeth<s%> any <S%G5100>thing,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>
Ye did <S%G5143>run<s%> <S%G2573>well;<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> did <S%G348>hinder<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> that ye should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth?<s%>
This <S%G3988>persuasion<s%> cometh <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> him that <S%G2564>calleth<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>
A <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> <S%G2220>leaveneth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5445>lump.<s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> have <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye will be none otherwise <S%G5426>minded:<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G243><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G5015>troubleth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> shall <S%G941>bear<s%> his <S%G2917>judgment,<s%> <S%G3748>whosoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G5600>be.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do I <S%G2089>yet<s%> suffer <S%G1377>persecution?<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4625>offense<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G2673>ceased.<s%>
I <S%G3785>would<s%> they were <S%G2532>even<s%> cut <S%G609>off<s%> which <S%G387>trouble<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

For, <S%G1063><s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> have been <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G1657>liberty;<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> use <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> an <S%G874>occasion<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> one <S%G240>another.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> even <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>this;<s%> Thou shalt <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1438>thyself.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G1143>bite<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devour<s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%> take <S%G991>heed<s%> that ye be <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G355>consumed<s%> one of <S%G240>another.<s%>

This I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1161>then,<s%> <S%G4043>Walk<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G5055>fulfill<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1937>lusteth<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> are <S%G480>contrary<s%> the one to the <S%G240>other:<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> ye <S%G3361>cannot<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G302><s%> ye <S%G2309>would.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye be <S%G71>led<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5318>manifest,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> these; <S%G3430>adultery,<s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%>

Idolatry, <S%G1495><s%> <S%G5331>witchcraft,<s%> <S%G2189>hatred,<s%> <S%G2054>variance,<s%> <S%G2205>emulations,<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G2052>strife,<s%> <S%G1370>seditions,<s%> <S%G139>heresies,<s%>

Envyings, <S%G5355><s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> <S%G2970>revellings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5125>such<s%> <S%G3664>like:<s%> of the <S%G3739>which<s%> I tell you <S%G4302>before,<s%> <S%G5213><s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> I have <S%G2532>also<s%> told you in time <S%G4277>past,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they which <S%G4238>do<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering,<s%> <S%G5544>gentleness,<s%> <S%G19>goodness,<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%>
Meekness, <S%G4236><s%> <S%G1466>temperance:<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that are <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> have <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3804>affections<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1939>lusts.<s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> let us <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
Let us <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> desirous of vain <S%G2755>glory,<s%> <S%G4292>provoking<s%> one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G5354>envying<s%> one <S%G240>another.<s%>
